Posts.Content: Hi Steph - my dad is about to undergo radiotherapy in 10 days for his brain tumor and im thinking of buying him a picture frame with a special picture of me and him together in it - so at night times when im not with him, he will be able to glance over and take a look at it and remember that im always with him. maybe you could do the same, although the angel ideas is lovely though. Good luck. Hope all goes well. Lauren x
